title: Fungus Gnat & Pest Smoke Bomb - 4 Pack | Quick-Release Permethrin Formula for Rapid Insect Eradication | Non-Staining | Effective in Hard-to-Reach Spaces
features: Rapid and Comprehensive Insect Control: The READY STEADY DEFEND Fungus Gnat Smoke Bomb is engineered for immediate action, offering a swift solution to your pest problems. Ideal for targeting a wide range of insects, including the stubborn fungus gnats, fleas, bed bugs, silverfish, moths, ants, spiders, and more. Its quick-release formula ensures that flying and crawling nuisances are eliminated on contact, providing peace of mind with rapid results.

Potent Permethrin-Based Formula: Infused with a high-strength Permethrin insecticide, this fumigation treatment is your frontline defence against persistent insect invaders. The READY STEADY DEFEND Smoke Bomb penetrates the lifecycle of pests, ensuring complete eradication on contact. Trust in the effectiveness of our formula to conquer even the most challenging infestations and protect your space from future invasions.

Unmatched Penetration in Concealed Spaces: Our smoke bomb is designed to distribute a fine mist that reaches into every nook and cranny, ensuring no pest is spared. Ideal for spaces where fungus gnats and other insects breed and hide, such as plant soil, under furniture, and in cracks. This thorough coverage guarantees a pest-free space, tackling hard-to-reach areas that traditional sprays and treatments might miss.

Clean and Approved Application: Enjoy a pest-control solution that respects your home’s cleanliness and ambiance. The READY STEADY DEFEND Smoke Bomb is formulated to be non-staining, ensuring that your home remains fresh and clean post-fumigation. Apply in any room without worry about residual smells or stains, guarding your home’s aesthetics.
